snippet: David H. Petraeus’s resignation comes during a year when a  large number of senior officers were investigated and fired for poor judgment and sexual improprieties.
abstract: David H Petraeus's resignation as director of Central Intelligence Agency comes during year when large number of senior military officers were investigated and even fired for poor judgment and sexual improprieties, raising concerns about culture of military's leadership.
lead_paragraph: David H. Petraeus’s resignation comes during a year when a  large number of senior officers were investigated and fired for poor judgment and sexual improprieties.

headline.seo: Concern Grows Over Top Military Officers’ Ethics
